manager.changelog: - Gradle update /n- Fix the problem that VirusTotal detects Trojan when building with BuildType set to 'release'

vanced.changelog:
This is an unofficial version and is in beta! 

- Bumped base 
- Fix RYD not working when 'old layout' setting is on (more testing may be needed) 
- Reimplementation of hide comment function 
- Added 'recommend for you' removal option 
- Removed 'old style video quality settings' option (because sometimes it doesn't work) 
- Apply Black Theme to Splash Screen as well 
- Reset some preset settings 
- Some Vanced integration update 

KNOWN ISSUES: 
- 'old style video quality settings' does not work 
- Home screen ads still appear on some devices 
- RYD does not work 
- HDR Brightness settings does not work on some devices 
- For NON-ROOT version, microg must be installed
